title: @Riot Replay app = Perma Ban?
body:
What the title says.
Would using a replay app cause a red flag and result on a perma ban??
I've been seeing a lot of perma ban complaints about 3rd party apps. Just need to be sure before i use one. 
I've been seeing it on youtube vids like Brofresco.

replies.body:
It depends on the app, but generally speaking no it will not get you banned. Things like LOLReplay, and SKinSpotLights tool, which are replay specific apps, are totally okay. However, if you use an application that has Replay support built into it adjacent to other functionality that is NOT okay, such as cheating abilities, then obviously not.. even if you claim to only use the replay functions.

There's been some good posts from us in the past to help provide this kind of guidance: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications
Patience you do not have, young padawan
Bumping even 3 minutes later increases visibility on "recent" and 3d/4th page of "hot" views.
